report_title: Industry Report on Office Plant Services
executive_summary: The industry has benefited from growing demand for exterior landscapes from nonresidential customers. As companies ask employees to return to the office post-pandemic, demand for office plant services will climb. IBISWorld estimates industry revenue will increase at a CAGR of 2.8% to $28.1 billion over the five years to 2024, including an increase of 0.1% as demand from businesses rebounds as the world continues settling post-pandemic. At the same time, profit is expected to drop to 8.1%. The industry is expected to experience continued growth over the five years to 2029 as an improving macroeconomic environment and rising corporate profit lead more businesses to better afford the discretionary services provided by the industry.

current_performance.current_performance_point_title: Blossoming revenue as businesses return to the office
current_performance.current_performance_point_description: The end of the lockdowns and the reopening of the economy has brought clients back to utilizing office plant services. As workers return to working in offices, businesses want to ensure workers feel comfortable and office plants are conducive for that.

current_performance.current_performance_point_title: New office plant servicers keep entering the industry
current_performance.current_performance_point_description: The low barriers to entry and minimal start-up costs that characterize the industry encouraged new participants to the industry despite recent volatility. This is expected to continue as workers return to the office.

future_outlook.future_outlook_point_title: Demand will continue blooming in the coming years
future_outlook.future_outlook_point_description: Lucrative commercial projects like resort and hotel grounds installation and maintenance will rise as consumers increase spending on previously foregone travel. Maintenance on existing college, business and hotel campuses will provide stable work for office plant services companies moving forward.

future_outlook.future_outlook_point_title: New office plant servicers will continue to grow
future_outlook.future_outlook_point_description: New participants are expected to enter the industry to fulfill growing demand from key market segments for exterior landscaping services to attract customers, employees and tenants.

industry_definition: Operators in this industry are primarily engaged in the maintenance of plants and shrubs at commercial buildings, including maintaining greenery in public spaces and selling plants to offices.

negative_impact_factors: Barriers To Entry are low - steady

key_trends: Revenue is blossoming as businesses return to the office. The end of the lockdowns and the reopening of the economy has brought clients back to utilizing office plant services.

New office plant servicers keep entering the industry. The low barriers to entry and minimal start-up costs that characterize the industry encouraged new participants to the industry despite recent volatility.

There are no direct private or public assistance. The closest thing is the National Association of Landscape Professionals (NALP), which works to ensure that regulations don't place undue burdens on the landscaping companies. These types of regulations overflow onto office plant services.

Stringency of safety measures is on the rise. Occupational safety and health provisions require training for using machinery and tools and require the use of personal protective equipment such as footwear, eyewear and earplugs.

market_segmentation.segment_description: Homeowners' associations are organizations that make sure a residential community is keeping to a certain standard in appearance. Homeowners' associations will hire office plant services to ensure plants and shrubs are kept healthy and aesthetically pleasing.

Corporate campuses are either lands and buildings where one company has lots of buildings or a business building that host several companies. Corporate campuses hire office plant services to maintain plants and shrubs in the common areas. Businesses like to adorn their sites with plants and shrubs since the bit of nature in corporate life makes workers' lives a bit better and helps with productivity. There was a dip during the pandemic as shutdowns forced many businesses to close their doors and reduced the need to maintain office plants and shrubs. But as the economy gets farther away from the pandemic, this market keeps increasing.

Public parks are parks owned by local governments. Those governments hire office plant servicers to maintain the plants and shrubs in parks instead of maintaining them directly. This market size has been relatively stable in the last few years. Most governments, despite economic turns, continue to maintain public parks, since their budgets usually allocate for those types of expenses. It's very rare for a local government to completely cut off money for public parks.

Retail centers are land and buildings devoted to retail shops. Similarly to corporate campuses, retail centers keep and maintain plants and shrubs to make the shopping experience more pleasant. This market hires office plant servicers to attend to the plants and shrubs. Like hotels and resorts, retail centers experienced decreased activity during the pandemic but has been increasing since lockdowns ended. As people keep attending retail shops, retail centers will increase their use of office plant services to make sure the plants and shrubs look well.

Hotels and resorts have plants and shrubs to adorn their premises, so their guests enjoy their stay. The ones in this market in particular hire office plant servicers to attend to their plants and shrubs. The lockdowns in response to the pandemic limited the number of guests attending hotels and resorts. Hotel and resorts were limiting their spending to the essentials, which doesn't include hiring office plant services. The years since the pandemic have seen this market slowly increase its use of office plant services as more people return to hotels and resorts.

Medical centers are hospitals and other type of medical facilities. Medical centers, like the other markets in this industry, keep plants and shrubs for both decorations and for practical purposes. Plants and nature are reported to keep moral and general health high. The injection of money by governments during the pandemic increased the budget for many hospitals. In recent years hospital have had extra money which where allocated to hiring office plant services for the maintained of plants and shrubs.

Educational institutions are primarily universities. These educational institutions in this market hire office plant services to keep and maintain the plants and shrubs that adorn the universities. This market has neither increased nor decreased drastically in the last few years. Educational institutions similarly to the other markets in this industry, were heavily influenced by the pandemic. The lockdowns reduced the need for office plant services, but as we become removed from the pandemic, this market will expand.

products_and_services.product_description: Bedding plants are plants, usually flowers, grown in a large quantity in pots to be transported to some kind of container. For the office plant services industry, these bedding plants are transported to an office for decoration.
Other office plants consist of plants that overlap the product segments and don't fit neatly into one segment.
Potted flowering plants are flowers still attached to its stem and roots and reside in a pot. The type of flower can vary. These potted flowers are put in offices.
Foliage plants are grown and sold for the ability to both blend into the background whilst still being visually captivating. Offices buy these plants for that reason.
Cut flowers are flowers cut from their plan to be placed in a vase. Offices purchase cut flowers when they want highlight beauty even if it comes at a relative cost.

tier_1_suppliers: Home Improvement Stores in the US
Lawn & Outdoor Equipment Stores in the US
Nursery & Garden Stores in the US
tier_2_suppliers: Tool & Hardware Wholesaling in the US
Flower & Nursery Stock Wholesaling in the US

demand_determinants.determinant_title: Bedding Plants are Popular Due to Their Versatility
demand_determinants.determinant_description: Bedding plants are consistently one of the largest product segments. Since they're grown in large numbers and come in different varieties, they are a relatively cheap way of adorning an office. Bedding plants are expected to continue being a very popular product segment for office plant services.

demand_determinants.determinant_title: Potted Flowering Plants Are Popular Because They Allow Offices To Focus On One Specific Flower
demand_determinants.determinant_description: Potted flowering plants are not as big as bedding plants because potted flowers don't tend to come in bulk. So they can be a bit more expensive and they usually have as many flowers per pot as bedding plants. A potted flower can be a nice addition to an office space, so this segment is expected to continue holding roughly the same share of industry products moving forward.

demand_determinants.determinant_title: Foliage Plants Are Good Complements To Office Decoration And This Sustains Its Share Of Revenue
demand_determinants.determinant_description: This segment doesn't hold a large portion of industry products, but it's a staple for its ability to be a complement to flowers or the stand-alone decoration. It is expected that offices will continue buying foliage plants in a similar amount as they have been in recent years.

demand_determinants.determinant_title: Cut Flowers Are Beautiful But Not As Economically Feasible For Large Purchases
demand_determinants.determinant_description: Cut flowers are the smallest product segment for office plant services. Since they are cut from the plant, they have a relatively short shelf life compared to bedding and potted flowers. Offices can't buy as many of these flowers and usually not as often.

demand_determinants.determinant_title: Shrubs' Relatively Ease Of Maintenance Makes This The Most Popular Product
demand_determinants.determinant_description: Shrub plants are low in height and have multiple stems and usually have dense foliage. These plants are sturdy, available year-round and aren't high-maintenance. Shrubs hold, have held and expected to continue holding the largest share of product revenue. These plants require less thought in purchasing than the other product segments. They can be used to blend into the background

basis_points.basis_description: To enter office plant services, no formal training or license is required for basic lawn mowing services. Little investment is needed to start a business.

Buyers seek out office plant servicers that offer competitive prices because services are relatively indistinguishable. Consistently well-done work is key, and competition for commercial work is limited by clients' need for quick services that can be done at scale.

Small-scale, low-value work limits scale of national companies. The sheer volume of small-scale, low-value work conducted by small companies in the single-family housing market prevents larger companies from capturing a substantial portion of revenue.
Clients may opt out to complete their own office plant service maintenance. During economic downturns, cash-strapped companies favor performing plant services themselves.

cost_factors.cost_factor_title: High wage costs due to the heavy reliance on labor
cost_factors.cost_factor_description: The high wage costs are driven by the heavy reliance on employees to perform arduous tasks including loading and unloading shipments, preparing and maintaining flower beds, moving plants and shrubs around the work site and planting and maintaining landscape horticulture.

cost_factors.cost_factor_title: Purchase costs are significant as there are a lot of essential materials
cost_factors.cost_factor_description: Office plant services purchase costs mainly include nursery goods such as physical plants, related planting materials, hand tools, power equipment and fuel. These are necessary to provide office plant services.

capital_intensity_points.capital_intensity_title: Low rate of new patent technologies entering the industry
capital_intensity_points.capital_intensity_description: The rate of new patent technologies entering the industry is low, which limits the potential for innovations. A low rate does not mean that innovations cannot occur, just that the likelihood of some innovation materializing as a threat is lower.

capital_intensity_points.capital_intensity_title: High concentration of technologies in the industry
capital_intensity_points.capital_intensity_description: However, the concentration of technologies is high in this industry. This suggests that industry operators have exposure to potentially unforeseen areas of innovation.

The major markets for this industry are highly concentrated, which implies that the market has a focus on key customer segments. This presents an opportunity for strategic entrance into lower-end markets or unserved markets for innovations to take on a disruptive trajectory.

volatility_points.volatility_description: Economic conditions influence success for office plant services as consumers choose to outsource these tasks rather than perform them themselves. For example, as profit remains relatively high, businesses will be likely to use office plant services.

FAQs.question: What factors affect demand for office plant services?
FAQs.answer: Good economic conditions boost demand as consumers outsource tasks. Poor economic conditions reduce demand as businesses cut costs.
